description: Actionable plan compiled from KYC Face Scan Integration Plan - merging new face scan features with existing KYC system.

todos.text:
PHASE 0: SETUP & PROTOCOL (READ FIRST)

**Explanations:** This phase establishes the critical pre-integration backup and preparation steps. Before any integration work begins, we must secure the existing face modules, document current endpoints, and establish a baseline for rollback capability. This is non-negotiable for production safety.

**Concluding Step: Phase Completion Protocol**
```bash
python3 todo_manager.py show kyc_integration_actionable_20250116
python3 todo_manager.py done kyc_integration_actionable_20250116 0
```

IMPORTANT NOTE: DO NOT skip this phase under any circumstances. The backup created here is your only rollback mechanism if integration issues arise. Verify backup integrity before proceeding.

PHASE 1: SYSTEM ANALYSIS & MAPPING

**Explanations:** Map the exact overlaps and dependencies between existing KYC modules (face_matcher, pad_detector, evidence_extractor) and new face scan modules (session_manager, challenge_generator, burst_processor). Create a comprehensive dependency graph and feature overlap matrix to drive all subsequent integration decisions.

**Concluding Step: Phase Completion Protocol**
```bash
python3 todo_manager.py show kyc_integration_actionable_20250116
python3 todo_manager.py done kyc_integration_actionable_20250116 1
```

IMPORTANT NOTE: This analysis phase is critical - it identifies which modules to merge, which to keep separate, and which are entirely new contributions. Document all findings in the module comparison matrix.

PHASE 2: DEDUPLICATION STRATEGY

**Explanations:** Intelligently merge duplicate functionality while preserving unique features. Combine PAD detection modules (pad_detector.py + pad_scorer.py), consolidate face analysis (geometry.py + quality_analyzer.py), and unify metrics collection. Maintain ISO 30107-3 compliance while adding texture/frequency analysis capabilities.

**Concluding Step: Phase Completion Protocol**
```bash
python3 todo_manager.py show kyc_integration_actionable_20250116
python3 todo_manager.py done kyc_integration_actionable_20250116 2
```

IMPORTANT NOTE: Preserve the best features from both implementations. Run comparison tests on merged modules to ensure no functionality is lost during consolidation.

PHASE 3: OCR/EXTRACTION INTEGRATION

**Explanations:** Connect the existing OCR capabilities (evidence_extractor.py) with the face scan flow. Enhance the extractor with confidence scoring per field, create streaming updates for real-time feedback, and integrate extraction into the burst evaluation pipeline for back-side document processing.

**Concluding Step: Phase Completion Protocol**
```bash
python3 todo_manager.py show kyc_integration_actionable_20250116
python3 todo_manager.py done kyc_integration_actionable_20250116 3
```

IMPORTANT NOTE: This phase directly addresses the OCR gap identified in UX requirements. Test extraction thoroughly with sample Philippine IDs to ensure accuracy.

PHASE 4: BIOMETRIC INTEGRATION

**Explanations:** Link the existing FaceMatcher with session management for unified decision making. Add match score calculation to session state, update decision logic to incorporate biometric scores, and integrate TAR@FAR calculations for identity verification accuracy.

**Concluding Step: Phase Completion Protocol**
```bash
python3 todo_manager.py show kyc_integration_actionable_20250116
python3 todo_manager.py done kyc_integration_actionable_20250116 4
```

IMPORTANT NOTE: Biometric integration is critical for identity verification accuracy. Validate match scores against a test dataset before proceeding.

PHASE 5: UNIQUE FEATURES ENHANCEMENT

**Explanations:** Add our innovative features to the existing system - lock tokens for sequential flow control, dynamic challenge generation for enhanced liveness, burst processing for multi-frame consensus, comprehensive telemetry, WORM audit logging, Prometheus metrics, and acceptance validation. These are our unique value-adds.

**Concluding Step: Phase Completion Protocol**
```bash
python3 todo_manager.py show kyc_integration_actionable_20250116
python3 todo_manager.py done kyc_integration_actionable_20250116 5
```

IMPORTANT NOTE: These features represent our core contributions to the system. Ensure each feature integrates cleanly without disrupting existing functionality.

PHASE 6: API CONSOLIDATION

**Explanations:** Create a unified API structure with consistent patterns. Merge face scan endpoints under /api/v1/kyc/face/*, standardize response formats, add security middleware for CORS and rate limiting, and implement unified error handling across all endpoints.

**Concluding Step: Phase Completion Protocol**
```bash
python3 todo_manager.py show kyc_integration_actionable_20250116
python3 todo_manager.py done kyc_integration_actionable_20250116 6
```

IMPORTANT NOTE: Maintain backward compatibility for existing endpoints. Update API documentation and test all endpoints thoroughly before marking complete.

PHASE 7: FRONT/BACK DOCUMENT FLOW

**Explanations:** Implement document side tracking and state transitions to support the complete capture flow. Add front/back side tracking to session state, implement the DocumentCaptureState machine, create transition events, and support flip-to-back animations as specified in UX requirements.

**Concluding Step: Phase Completion Protocol**
```bash
python3 todo_manager.py show kyc_integration_actionable_20250116
python3 todo_manager.py done kyc_integration_actionable_20250116 7
```

IMPORTANT NOTE: This phase is critical for UX parity with requirements. Test the complete front-to-back capture flow including state transitions.

PHASE 8: REAL-TIME FIELD STREAMING

**Explanations:** Implement real-time streaming of extraction results to clients. Add WebSocket support for extraction updates, implement Server-Sent Events as a fallback mechanism, create extraction progress generators, and stream field confidence scores as they become available.

**Concluding Step: Phase Completion Protocol**
```bash
python3 todo_manager.py show kyc_integration_actionable_20250116
python3 todo_manager.py done kyc_integration_actionable_20250116 8
```

IMPORTANT NOTE: Real-time feedback is essential for UX. Test streaming with multiple concurrent sessions to ensure scalability.

PHASE 9: INTEGRATION TESTING

**Explanations:** Validate the complete KYC flow with all integrated components. Create comprehensive integration test suites, run performance benchmarks against acceptance criteria, execute load testing with concurrent users, and test error scenarios and edge cases.

**Concluding Step: Phase Completion Protocol**
```bash
python3 todo_manager.py show kyc_integration_actionable_20250116
python3 todo_manager.py done kyc_integration_actionable_20250116 9
```

IMPORTANT NOTE: Must meet all acceptance criteria before production deployment. Generate detailed test reports with pass/fail metrics for review.

PHASE 10: CLEANUP & DOCUMENTATION

**Explanations:** Finalize the codebase for production deployment. Remove duplicate modules, reorganize code into appropriate directories, update all import paths, enhance documentation with new features, create migration guides, and document any breaking changes.

**Concluding Step: Phase Completion Protocol**
```bash
python3 todo_manager.py show kyc_integration_actionable_20250116
python3 todo_manager.py done kyc_integration_actionable_20250116 10
```

IMPORTANT NOTE: Documentation and cleanup are essential for long-term maintainability. Ensure all changes are properly documented for future developers.
